query.statement:
SELECT A.UPJANG, A.HALL_CD, A.MEAL, C.CODE_NAME MEAL_NAME, A.CORNER, D.CODE_NAME CORNER_NAME, B.MENU_DATE, A.CORNER_DESC, D.CODE_NAME||DECODE(A.CORNER_DESC,NULL,'','['||A.CORNER_DESC||']') CORNER_DETAIL_NAME, B.MENU_FEATURE, B.SALE_PRICE, B.EXPECT_MEAL_QTY, B.REAL_MEAL_QTY, (SELECT 'Y' FROM FSH_CYCLE_RECIPE_ITEM Z WHERE Z.UPJANG = B.UPJANG AND Z.MENU_CD = B.MENU_CD AND Z.ORDER_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = 1) AS ORDER_YN FROM FSA_HALL_DTL A, FSH_CYCLE_MENU_MST B, SCC_COMMON_CODE C, SCC_COMMON_CODE D WHERE A.UPJANG=B.UPJANG AND A.HALL_CD=B.HALL_CD AND A.CORNER=B.CORNER AND A.MEAL=B.MEAL AND C.GROUP_CODE = 'FS0023' --코너 AND D.GROUP_CODE = 'FS0022' --끼니 AND A.MEAL=C.CODE AND A.CORNER=D.CODE AND A.USE_YN='Y'--사용중지된 끼니코너 제거
AND B.EXPECT_MEAL_QTY<>0 --식수 예측되지 않은 끼니코너 제거
AND A.UPJANG=#UPJANG#
AND A.HALL_CD=#HALL_CD#
AND B.MENU_DATE=#CUR_DATE#
AND A.MEAL=#MEAL#
ORDER BY A.CORNER
